original: n'a gi ba su p'a la mu kha s'a dha nam /
analyzed: n'a gi ba su p'a la mu kha s'a dha nam /

original: klu mo nor skyong zhal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: klu mo nor skyong zhal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Yakṣiṇī Vasupālamukhā

original: zhes so // bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bskyal nas /
analyzed: zhes so // bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bskyal nas /
translated: Having performed one hundred thousand recitations,

original: de nas chu bo gnyis phrad pa'i sar 'bras kyi 'o thug za zhing /
analyzed: de nas chu bo gnyis phrad pa'i sar 'bras kyi 'o thug za zhing /
translated: then, at a place where two rivers meet, eating rice gruel,

original: stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas klu'i gnas nas mdzes ma cig 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas klu'i gnas nas mdzes ma cig 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: by reciting [the mantra] eight thousand times, a beautiful woman will come from the abode of the nāgas.

original: byung ba dang de'i mgo la me tog phul nas bdag gi chung ma gyis zhes brjod do ;
analyzed: byung ba dang de'i mgo la me tog phul nas bdag gi chung ma gyis zhes brjod do ;
translated: When she arrives, offer a flower to her head and say, Be my wife.

original: / de nas chung ma'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de nas chung ma'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then she will do all the work of a wife.

original: nyi ma re la lha'i 'dod yon ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma re la lha'i 'dod yon ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Every day she will bestow divine enjoyments.

original: nor skyong ma'i sa ma pa th'a//
analyzed: nor skyong ma'i sa ma pa th'a//
